This is a little project I whipped up in my spare timeâ€”hope it brings you some joy! ## ğŸ¯ Game Intro 2048 is a simple yet addictive number-merging game. On a 4x4 grid, swipe up, down, left, or right to merge tiles with the same number. The goal? Reach 2048 (but hey, you can keep going for even higher scores)! **How to play:** - Use arrow keys or WASD to move the tiles.

Content: - When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one. - After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot. - The game ends when there are no more moves left. ## âœ¨ Special Features ### 1. Undo Function - Made a wrong move? No worries! - Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step. - You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start. - Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again! ### 2. Secret Cheat Mode - Enter the magic sequence: â†â†â†’â†’ â†’â†’â†â† (left, left, right, right, right, right, left, left) - All tiles will magically turn into 128! - Itâ€™s an Easter egg, just for fun. - Pro tip: Cheating is fun, but donâ€™t overdo it! ğŸ˜‰ ## ğŸ¯ Demo ğŸ¯ : [Play here](http://2048.765431.xyz/) ## ğŸ“ Project Structure

Kein Problem! - DrÃ¼cke einfach auf den "RÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig"-Button, um einen Schritt zurÃ¼ckzugehen. - Du kannst beliebig oft rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen, bis ganz zum Anfang. - Lass eine ungeschickte Bewegung nie wieder dein Spiel ruinieren! ### 2. Geheimer Cheat-Modus - Gib die magische Sequenz ein: â†â†â†’â†’ â†’â†’â†â† (links, links, rechts, rechts, rechts, rechts, links, links) - Alle Kacheln werden magisch zu 128! - Es ist ein Easter Egg, nur zum SpaÃŸ. - Profi-Tipp: Schummeln macht SpaÃŸ, aber Ã¼bertreibe es nicht! ğŸ˜‰ ## ğŸ¯ Demo ğŸ¯ : [Hier spielen](http://2048.765431.xyz/) ## ğŸ“ Projektstruktur

Content:
**File Descriptions:**
- `2048.py`: Backend server written with Flask, handles game logic and API requests.
- `script.js`: Frontend game logic, including moves, animations, and special features.
- `styles.css`: Game styles, making sure everything looks nice and responsive.
- `index.html`: The main page that brings everything together.

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

**Method 1: Download Release**
1. Download the latest release.
2. Make sure you have Python 3.x installed.
3. Install dependencies: `pip install flask`
4. Run: `python 2048.py`
5. Open your browser and go to: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**Method 2: Clone from GitHub**
Translation:

- `2048.py`: Backend-Server geschrieben mit Flask, verarbeitet Spiellogik und API-Anfragen.
- `script.js`: Frontend-Spiellogik, einschlieÃŸlich ZÃ¼ge, Animationen und Spezialfunktionen.
- `styles.css`: Spiel-Styles, sorgen dafÃ¼r, dass alles schÃ¶n und responsiv aussieht.
- `index.html`: Die Hauptseite, die alles zusammenfÃ¼hrt.

## ğŸš€ Erste Schritte

**Methode 1: Release herunterladen**
1. Lade das neueste Release herunter.
2. Stelle sicher, dass Python 3.x installiert ist.
3. Installiere AbhÃ¤ngigkeiten: `pip install flask`
4. Starte: `python 2048.py`
5. Ã–ffne deinen Browser und gehe zu: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**Methode 2: Von GitHub klonen**

Content:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/sz30/2048.git
cd 2048
pip install flask
python 2048.py
```

